author: PCMag
title: Amazon workers in NYC warehouse strike to demand coronavirus protections
description: Amazon warehouse staff in Staten Island walked out of work Monday morning to protest the lack of COVID-19 protections for employees still plugging away during the outbreak. Personnel at the facility—where someone recently tested positive for the virus—will "c…
